products.name: Moringa Leaves
products.description: Rich in antioxidants and essential vitamins, moringa leaves support immune health and energy levels.

products.name: Neem Leaves
products.description: Known for their antibacterial properties, neem leaves promote healthy skin and oral hygiene.

products.name: Mint Leaves
products.description: Fresh and aromatic, mint leaves aid digestion and refresh the breath naturally.

products.name: Basil Leaves
products.description: Holy basil leaves are used to reduce stress, support respiratory health, and enhance flavor in cooking.

products.name: Flaxseeds
products.description: A powerhouse of omega-3 fatty acids, flaxseeds help in improving heart health and digestion.

products.name: Chia Seeds
products.description: Packed with fiber and protein, chia seeds are ideal for weight management and sustained energy.

products.name: Fenugreek Seeds
products.description: Fenugreek seeds support blood sugar control, enhance lactation, and improve digestion.

products.name: Sesame Seeds
products.description: Rich in calcium and magnesium, sesame seeds support bone health and provide a nutty flavor.

products.name: Turmeric Powder
products.description: A natural anti-inflammatory, turmeric powder is excellent for joint health and glowing skin.

products.name: Ginger Powder
products.description: With its warming properties, ginger powder aids digestion and soothes colds and flu.

products.name: Ashwagandha Powder
products.description: Known for its adaptogenic properties, ashwagandha powder reduces stress and improves vitality.

products.name: Spirulina Powder
products.description: High in protein and antioxidants, spirulina powder boosts energy and supports detoxification.
